item.title: F1 Testing: Piastri goes fastest as McLaren impress LIVE!
'Another nonsense!' - Wolff fumes despite accepting proposed engine change
item.description: Mercedes boss Toto Wolff says he is "philosophically" opposed to the FIA's proposal of a mid-season rule change over a contentious engine element, but says his team are willing to be "good citizens" by accepting it despite it potentially harming their performance.

item.title: Potential game-changer? Ferrari's 'clever' upside-down rear wing spotted in testing
item.description: Technical analyst Sam Collins examines Ferrari's innovative upside-down rear wing during the second day of the final test in Bahrain.

item.title: 'I'm more connected with this car' - Hamilton 'really excited' for new F1 seasonÂ
item.description: Lewis Hamilton says he feels "more connected" to Ferrari's 2026 car than its predecessor and that he is "really excited" to see what the team can achieve this season.

item.title: Final pre-season test in Bahrain! | Day One F1 Testing Wrapped
item.description: Hear from Lewis Hamilton, Valtteri Bottas, Jonathan Wheatley and many more following the first day of the second testing in Bahrain.

item.title: FIA propose mid-season rule change amid engine controversy
item.description: The FIA have proposed a mid-season rule change to its engine regulations with a vote set to take place before the Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: Highlights: Russell quickest and registers most laps in Bahrain
item.description: Watch the highlights of the first day of the second Bahrain pre-season Test.

item.title: 'We've missed this' | Cars go racing as F1 trials new start procedure
item.description: Watch the grid line up to complete a practice start at the Bahrain Test Two Day One.

item.title: Who's done the fastest times and most laps at F1's final pre-season test?
item.description: Find out who has the fastest times and which teams have completed the most laps at the final F1 pre-season test in Bahrain so far.

item.title: F1 bosses holding talks over doubling number of Sprint weekends
Class of 2026! F1 drivers reunite in wholesome behind the scenes
item.description: Watch as F1 drivers reunite to take their class of 2026 season photo.

item.title: Russell starts final F1 test strongly as Hamilton suffers first Ferrari issue
item.description: George Russell was fastest for Mercedes on the first day of Formula 1's final 2026 testing event as Ferrari hit significant trouble for the first time in pre-season when Lewis Hamilton's running was limited by a technical issue.

item.title: How key F1 meetings could have huge implications on 2026 season
item.description: The final test of the 2026 Formula 1 pre-season gets under way on Wednesday, but the most crucial action of the day may well be away from the track at the Bahrain International Circuit.

item.title: Button: Hamilton has 'perfect opportunity' to turn Ferrari story around
item.description: The 2026 Formula 1 season provides Lewis Hamilton with the "perfect opportunity to turn it around" at Ferrari, according to his former team-mate Jenson Button.

item.title: Alonso: It's a matter of time until Aston Martin have the best F1 car
item.description: Fernando Alonso is in no doubt that Aston Martin will "eventually have the best car" in F1 with Adrian Newey at the team but says they are first braced to be on the "back foot" in the first part of the 2026 season.

item.title: When to watch final F1 pre-season test on Sky Sports
item.description: Formula 1's preparations for its new era in 2026 come to a conclusion with one last test in Bahrain as the new racing campaign draws ever nearer.

item.title: Barcelona to remain on F1 calendar until 2032 in rotation with Belgian GP
item.description: The Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya will remain on the Formula 1 calendar until 2032 after a deal was agreed for the event to feature in a yearly rotation with the Belgian Grand Prix.

item.title: 'Pass the parcel!' - Why are F1's big four all claiming each other are faster?
item.description: There is always mystery at Formula 1 testing over which team actually has the fastest car, but the 2026 pre-season puzzle is shaping up as one of the most confusing and complex in the sport's history.

item.title: Ferrari fastest, McLaren fourth?! The F1 2026 pecking order - so far!
item.description: Sky Sports’ Craig Slater and Ted Kravitz take look at pre-season testing so far with the first week of running in Bahrain complete.

item.title: Mercedes top last day of Bahrain test - but Russell warns of 'scary' rival
item.description: Mercedes' Kimi Antonelli and George Russell set the fastest times on the final day of the first Bahrain test ahead of Ferrari's Lewis Hamilton amid continued claims and counter claims from F1's four leading teams about who is really 2026's early leading force.

item.title: Latest tennis scores: Gauff, Alcaraz, Sinner in action on Thursday
Alcaraz, Sinner into Qatar Open quarter-finals
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz reached the quarter-finals at the Qatar Open with a straight-sets victory over Valentin Royer.

item.description: Highlights of the Dubai Tennis Championships between Elena Rybakina and Antonia Ruzic.

item.title: Australian player claims tennis is 'racist' and 'misogynistic' as she quits the sport
item.description: Australia's Destanee Aiava has announced her retirement from tennis at the age of 25 and claims she is turning her back on the game's "racist, misogynistic, homophobic and hostile" culture.

item.title: Alcaraz victorious in first match since his Australian Open triumph
item.description: Highlights of the first round match between Carlos Alcaraz and Arthur Rinderknech at the Qatar Open.

item.title: Gauff and teen sensation Jovic make it through to last 16 in Dubai
item.description: Coco Gauff and teen sensation Iva Jovic both made it through to the last 16 of the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships on Tuesday.

item.description: Highlights of the Dubai Tennis Championships between Coco Gauff and Anna Kalinskaya.

item.description: The latest news around British men's tennis No 1 Jack Draper as he prepares to make his ATP Tour return...

item.description: Keep track of Emma Raducanu's 2026 tennis schedule, latest results and next match on Sky Sports Tennis.

item.title: Raducanu suffers three-set defeat to lucky loser Ruzic in Dubai
item.description: Emma Raducanu was ousted from the Dubai Tennis Championships by lucky loser Antonia Ruzic as sickness and illness continued to take their toll on the British No 1.

item.title: De Minaur reigns in Rotterdam | Shelton beats Fritz to Dallas title
item.description: Alex de Minaur claimed his 11th ATP title after beating Felix Auger-Aliassime in straight sets in the final of the Rotterdam Open.

item.title: Mboko beaten in Qatar Open final in straight sets by Muchova
item.description: Young star Victoria Mboko was beaten 6-4 7-5 by Karolina Muchova in the Qatar Open final.

item.title: Norrie out of Rotterdam as Djokovic withdraws from Doha
item.description: British No 2 Cameron Norrie bowed out in the second round of the Rotterdam Open after losing to Australian qualifier Christopher O'Connell on Wednesday.

item.title: Shot of the year? | Fritz dazzles in Dallas with behind-the-back hot shot!
item.description: Taylor Fritz pulls off a stunning behind-the-back winner in Dallas. An early contender for shot of the year.

item.title: Gauff shocked by Cocciaretto at Qatar Open after Italian inspired by Winter Olympics
item.description: World No 5 Coco Gauff lost in straight sets to world No 57 Elisabetta Cocciaretto, suffering a shock 6-4 6-2 defeat in the second round of the Qatar Open.

item.title: Raducanu retires due to illness in first round of Qatar Open
item.description: Emma Raducanu retired due to illness from her first-round match at the Qatar Open against world No 80 Camilla Osorio.

item.title: Sources: Kings' Sabonis, LaVine done for season
item.description: Sacramento Kings stars Domantas Sabonis (knee) and Zach LaVine (hand) both underwent season-ending surgeries on Wednesday, league sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Slater

item.title: Curry still out for Warriors; Porzingis set to debut
item.description: The Golden State Warriors will be without star guard Stephen Curry when they exit the All-Star break on Thursday night against the Boston Celtics and the length of his ongoing absence is unclear.

item.title: Flagg's Mavericks debut jersey sells for $1 million
item.description: The jersey worn by Cooper Flagg in the first half of his NBA debut has been sold for $1 million, a record for a collectible of the Mavericks rookie.

item.title: Grizzlies' Morant to miss at least two more weeks
item.description: Grizzlies guard Ja Morant will miss at least two more weeks as he continues his recovery after spraining the ulnar collateral ligament in his left elbow on Jan. 21.

item.title: Kyrie to miss rest of season, eyes '26-27 return
item.description: Mavericks star Kyrie Irving will miss the remainder of the season as he continues to recover from knee surgery last March.

item.title: Magic's Wagner (ankle soreness) out indefinitely
item.description: Magic forward Franz Wagner will be sidelined indefinitely because of lingering soreness in his sprained left ankle, the team announced on Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Shams Charania

item.title: Embiid out against Hawks due to sore right shin
item.description: Joel Embiid reported soreness in his right shin over the All-Star break and will miss the Philadelphia 76ers' game against Atlanta on Thursday night.

item.title: Sources: Nuggets convert Jones to standard deal
item.description: The Denver Nuggets are converting two-way Spencer Jones to a standard NBA contract for the remainder of the season, sources told ESPN on Wednesday.

item.title: Gabriel limps off injured in Brazil win ahead of North London derby
item.description: Arsenal defender Gabriel has sparked an injury concern for the Gunners ahead of the north London derby after limping off in Brazil's 2-0 victory over Senegal at the Emirates.

item.title: England beaten by 10-player Brazil in first game since Euro 2025 triumph
item.description: A disastrous start saw England lose 2-1 to 10-player Brazil in their first match since their Euro 2025 triumph over the summer.

item.title: Vinicius Jr sends Brazil to 2026 World Cup on Ancelotti's home debut
item.description: A winner from Vinicius Jr helped Brazil to a 1-0 victory over Paraguay, and secured a place at the 2026 World Cup on a momentous home debut for new head coach Carlo Ancelotti.

item.title: Real Madrid boss Ancelotti to become Brazil head coach
item.description: Carlo Ancelotti will become the Brazil head coach from May 26 after finishing the season with Real Madrid.

item.title: Argentina embarrass rivals Brazil as holders qualify for 2026 World Cup
item.description: World Cup holders Argentina have qualified for next year's tournament after a historic 4-1 home win over rivals Brazil.

item.title: Vinicius breaks down in tears as he discusses racist abuse in Spain
item.description: Vinicius Junior broke down in tears as he told reporters the ongoing racist abuse he suffers in Spain is making him feel less motivated to play football.

item.title: Brazil wonderkid Endrick hits winner past blunt England
item.description: Wonderkid Endrick scored his first goal for Brazil as the five-time world champions hit England's Euro 2024 preparations with a 1-0 victory at Wembley.

item.description: The Soccer Saturday panel discuss who is ahead between Ollie Watkins and Ivan Toney to be deputy for Harry Kane in the England squad.

item.title: Toney set for first England start in Kane absence
Richarlison: Therapy saved my life | 'I was at rock bottom'
item.description: Tottenham forward Richarlison says having therapy "saved my life" as he encouraged others with mental health issues to do the same.

item.title: Lawyers of woman accusing Dani Alves want 12-year prison sentence
item.description: Lawyers for the woman accusing Dani Alves of sexual assault are asking for the maximum sentence of 12 years in prison for the Brazilian football player.

item.title: Robinho must serve nine-year prison sentence in Brazil
item.description: Former Manchester City forward Robinho must serve his nine-year prison sentence in Brazil as a result of his 2017 rape conviction in Italy, a Brazilian high court ruled on Wednesday.

item.title: Prosecutors want nine-year sentence for Alves in sexual assault trial
item.description: Prosecutors are seeking a nine-year prison sentence for Brazilian football star Dani Alves for allegedly sexually assaulting a woman last year, a Spanish court has said.

item.title: Injured Alisson set for a 'few weeks' out
item.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot has confirmed Alisson is set for 'a few weeks' out after the goalkeeper went down injured during his side's 1-0 win at Crystal Palace.

item.title: Brazilian football finds itself in a state of crisis
item.description: Brazilian football finds itself in a state of crisis.

item.title: Martinez tries to stop police attacking Argentina fans as Brazil beaten
item.description: Lionel Messi and Emiliano Martinez tried to intervene as police clashed with Argentina fans before they dealt Brazil a historic defeat at the Maracana in a World Cup qualifier.

item.title: Diaz double helps Colombia stun Brazil in front of freed father
item.description: Luis Diaz scored twice as Colombia stunned Brazil 2-1 in a World Cup qualifier, with his father watching in the stands days after he was released by kidnappers.

item.title: 'The opposite of Pep': Inside the world of footballâ€™s most innovative coach
item.description: The Copa Libertadores final pits Fluminense against Boca Juniors in the Maracana on Saturday. It is a huge moment for Flu, the Brazilian giants who are trying to win the competition for the first time. But the game has wider significance because of their team’s tactics.

item.title: Neymar to undergo surgery after suffering ACL injury
item.description: Brazil forward Neymar will undergo surgery after suffering a ruptured anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) and meniscus in his left knee, his club Al Hilal have announced.
